price: And [there is a sign in the story of] Moses when We sent him to Pharaoh with compelling proofs,
arabic: وَفِي مُوسَىٰٓ إِذۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَٰهُ إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ بِسُلۡطَٰنٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
